texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Welcome to the NEPA page","You will find the current issues of the NEPA, Engineering Notice, 'Look-Ahead' and Traction Current Switching times here.","Other 'rules' publications are available from the Network Improvement SharePoint site, permission for access to this site should be e-mailed to","OSWebsite@tfl.gov.uk","."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

As you are no doubt aware, we have been having problems with this site with the NEPA and Engineering Notice not uploading. We shall be running some tests before we start using this site again, so in the meantime please use the following alternative site:-
No password is required for this site and the puiblications can be found in the latest news area .
